title: BBC Local Live: Essex on Monday, 7 December 2015 - BBC News
summary: a man who was found dead in a tilbury docks container died of natural causes , an inquest finds .
clacton co-op discount accidently extends to east of england stores costing company thousands .
a 26-year-old man from maldon is due in court charged following a stabbing in the town .
x factor : two teenagers from essex make it to the show 's final .
more news , sport , travel and weather from 08:00 on tuesday .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: live updates for essex have finished for the day , but we 'll be back at 08:00 on tuesday with the latest news , sport , travel and weather .
have a good evening .

documents.title: audley end house flooding causes 'no damage '
text: essex fire and rescue says work to pump around 30cm ( 11.8ins ) of flood water from two cellars at audley end house has now been completed .
english heritage , who maintains the 17th century mansion near saffron walden , said the flooding was caused by a mains pipe failing , but there was no damage to the property .

documents.title: tilbury docks container death : man had 'underlying heart condition '
text: an afghan man who was found dead in a shipping container at tilbury docks last summer had an `` underlying heart condition '' , an inquest has heard .
meet singh kapoor , 40 , was one of 35 people stowed away .
the group had travelled from the port of zebrugge in belgium on 15 august 2014 .
the inquest at chelmsford coroner 's court was told mr kapoor 's death could have been triggered by the psychological and physical stress of being in the shipping container .
author: Charlotte Rose
BBC Essex

documents.title: picture of the day : a bird at fingringhoe
text: thanks to chrissie alexander who sent us this of an egret with a snail in fingringhoe for the top of our monday live page .
if you have a photo you 'd like to share with us , drop us an emailor visit ourfacebook page .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: weather : dry to start tonight , but rain will follow
text: dry at first tonight with clear spells and occasional cloud , but cloud will thicken to bring outbreaks of rain from the west later in the night .
feeling mild with a moderate southerly wind and temperatures dropping no lower than 9c ( 48f ) .
it will be cloudy and breezy with outbreaks of rain on tuesday morning , heavy in places , but becoming brighter for the afternoon with sunny spells and a few scattered showers .
for the latest forecast where you live , visit bbc weather .
author: Dan Holley
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: x factor : che chesterman in basildon tomorrow
text: incase you thought we 'd forgotten about our other essex x factor finalist , che chesterman will be heading to basildon tomorrow .
che chesterman comes home to basildon - in the town centre at 2.30-3.30pm tomorrow with nick grimshaw .
look out for the 'che battle bus '
@ twitterid wish it was later !
me and many others are at school

documents.title: headlines : westcliff police station reopens after bomb alert vandals smash paralympic race chair
text: here are your top stories for essex this afternoon :
author: Tom Croasdell
BBC Essex

documents.title: travel : london road reopens following westcliff police station evacuation
text: the a13 london road has reopened in both directions between hamlet court road and crowstone road .
the area was evacuated earlier this afternoon after an old bomb was handed into westcliff police station .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: what to do if you find explosive ordnance in your shed
text: an essex police officer has offered advice after a `` historical '' bomb was handed in at westcliff police station earlier , causing an evacuation of the building .
if you find any form of ordnance in your shed or outside somewhere please do n't take to a police station !
leave it where it is then call us .

documents.title: westcliff police station reopens following 'historical ' bomb evacuation
text: essex police has confirmed that staff and officers have been allowed to return to westcliff police station after it was evacuated earlier this afternoon .
the force says bomb disposal experts safely removed the `` historical explosive item '' which was brought into the station just before 13:45 .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: louisa johnson fans hope for glimpse of x factor finalist
text: the enormous x factor battle bus took up most of this chafford hundred cul-de-sac as finalist louisa johnson returned home .
one woman who came to see the 17-year-old singer was local resident leanne honey-jones , who said : `` my daughter is nine and loves louisa .
i 'm hoping to get an autograph for her because she 's at school . ''
author: Richard Smith
BBC Essex

documents.title: travel : westcliff police bomb incident closes london road
text: part of london road in westcliff-on-sea is closed as police deal with a `` historical '' bomb that was handed in at westcliff police station .
westcliff-on-sea - a13 london road .
closed in both directions between hamlet court road and cowstone road due to a police incident .

documents.title: bomb disposal experts attend westcliff police station
text: bomb disposal experts are currently at westcliff police station after an explosive item was handed in there earlier this afternoon .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: take a look at southend 's new buses
text: those of you who are into your buses might like to take a look at one of five refurbished buses rolling into south essex .
the new arriva fleet includes `` eco-leather seating '' , wifi , and an `` eye-catching '' new colour scheme .
the company tells us the buses will be used on the number five service between southend and basildon .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: weather : turning drier and brighter today but rain overnight
text: this afternoon will be staying dry with some prolonged sunshine .
it will be getting increasingly breezy but will stay mild .
maximum temperature : 13c ( 55f ) .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: x factor finalist louisa johnson visits home town
text: x factor finalist , louisa johnson , has come to her home town of chafford hundred to drum up support .
about 100 fans have waited here to meet the 17-year-old .
she was joined by pop star and mentor rita ora .
currently louisa is inside her mum 's house , having a cup of tea and a chat .
author: Richard Smith
BBC Essex

documents.title: four arrested over tesco express cigarette robbery
text: four men have been arrested following a robbery at a tesco express store in south ockendon over the weekend .
essex police says a man jumped over the checkout counter armed with a knife and removed a large quantity of cigarettes at the store in derry avenue on saturday .
the .
men were arrested on sus of robbery and also in connection with the theft of cigarettes from the same store on 3 december .
they have been bailed until february .

documents.title: westcliff police station evacuated after old bomb handed in
text: officers and staff have been evacuated from westcliff police station , after a historical bomb was handed in .
essex police says the device was brought in just before 13:45 and is currently awaiting the attendance of the explosive ordnance department .
we 'll bring you more details as we get them
author: Ian Puckey
BBC Essex

documents.title: cellar flooded at audley end house
text: essex fire and rescue says it is currently pumping water from the cellar ofaudley end housenear saffron walden .
we are told two rooms in the cellar of the 17th century mansion have become flooded with around 30cm ( 11.8ins ) of water .
author: Tom Croasdell
BBC Essex

documents.title: major improvements begin on m11 tonight
text: work to improve the road surface on the m11 between stansted and the m25 is starting from tonight .
the project involves resurfacing sections for 14 miles in both directions from j6 of the m25 to j8 .
work is being carried out between 22:00 and 06:00 and includes the m11-a120 link road .
it 's due to be completed by the end of february .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: southend drink spike victim 'could have died '
text: a young woman who had her drink spiked while on a night out in southend leaving her in need of hospital treatment told me she `` could have died '' .
chloe gookey , 18 , now she wants to raise awareness of the dangers that come with having your drink spiked .
author: Richard Smith
BBC Essex

documents.title: police investigate vandalism attack on paralympic hopeful 's racing wheelchair
text: essex police tells us it 's investigating after a racing wheelchair used by essex paralympic hopeful richard chiassaro was destroyed by vandals .
a wheel frame was buckled and the steering mechanism snapped sometime between 18:00 on 1 december and midday on 6 december at marks hall academy in the town .
chiassaro was due to go to australia for training in three weeks .
his family says he may now not be able to go .

documents.title: southend injured trio back in training
text: southend united will leave it late to decide whether gary deegan , noel hunt or michael timlin will feature in tomorrow night 's johnstone 's paint trophy match at home to millwall .
the trio are back in training after injuries .
author: Ben Fryer
BBC Essex sport

documents.title: witham teenager with tourette 's syndrome makes viral video about living with the condition
text: a teenager living with tourette 's syndrome has made a short film showing what it 's like to suffer from the condition , which can cause outbursts , involuntary swearing and tics .
author: Essex Chronicle
Essex Chronicle

documents.title: headlines : tilbury dock container death 'natural causes ' x factor battle bus rolls into essex
text: here are the top stories we 're looking at this lunchtime :
author: Tom Croasdell
BBC Essex

documents.title: rio paralympic hopes hindered after vandals smash racing wheelchair
text: an athlete has had his paralympic hopes hindered after vandals smashed his racing wheelchair .
richard chiassaro , from harlow , discovered the £ 8,000 wheelchair was broken `` beyond repair '' when he went to collect it from the marks hall academy in first avenue last week .
girlfriend claire broadbent told me : `` now something that he ca n't control may affect his chances of getting to rio , something that he 's worked so hard for . ''
author: Chris Flynn
BBC Essex

documents.title: e-fit released of attacker suspected of punching a woman
text: an e-fit has been released of one of two men police want to speak to after a woman was punched in the face in thundersley .
the force says the pair were seen acting sus by two women in the garden of a neighbour 's house in common lane on 16 november .
when confronted , one of the men punched a 36-year-old victim in the face , while the other threatened a 44-year-old woman .
you can read a full description of the men here .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: doh ! clacton co-op chain accidentally introduces 20 % discount at all stores
text: a supermarket in essex accidentally introduced a 20 % discount at all its stores - costing it thousands in lost revenue .
the east of england co-op intended to have the offer at just one of its shops in clacton starting last wednesday , however , computers introduced it at the checkouts of all its 140 shops .
the error was corrected a day later , but the company lost about £ 43,000 in revenue .
roger grosvenor , retail officer for the chain , said he was `` flabbergasted '' .
author: Andrew Woodger
BBC News

documents.title: builder saves the day after will quince struggles to get cover off new shrub end sign
text: a builder saved the day at the unveiling of a village sign .
author: Daily Gazette

documents.title: tilbury docks container death : man died of natural causes
text: a manfound in a container at tilbury docksdied of natural causes , an inquest has heard .
meet singh kapoor , 40 , was one of 35 immigrants from afghanistan found in a container back in august last year , the inquest at chelmsford coroner 's court heard .
he was one of 11 men , nine women and 15 children who were discovered .
author: Charlotte Rose
BBC Essex

documents.title: appeal for witnesses after colchester newsagents robbery
text: detectives are appealing for witnesses following a robbery where a man was threatened at a newsagents in colchester .
a man went in to the martins store in hunwicke road and demanded money about 17:30 on 30 november , police said .
he made off with a three-figure sum in a white carrier bag after threatening the member of staff .

documents.title: harwich christmas celebration goes ahead without controversial 'black peter '
text: a christmas celebration in harwich took place over the weekend without a controversial character called `` black peter '' .
the tradition , which comes from the netherlands , involves saint nicholas and a blacked-up person arriving at harwich port , handing out gifts to children , before parading to a local church .
more recently the role of santa 's helper was played by a black woman , however this year organisers say there was `` nobody available '' .

documents.title: x factor : finalist louisa johnson shows off battle bus
text: thurrock 's x factor finalist , louisa johnson , has taken to social media to show off her battle bus .
the 17-year-old will be out in the coach this week and the chances are you may see it driving around south essex .

documents.title: football : colchester through to fa cup third round
text: a last second goal from callum harriott has earned colchester united their place in tonight 's fa cup third round draw .
the u 's beat non-league altrincham 3-2 having trailed twice .
harriott scored two with tom lapslie getting the second equaliser .
author: Ben Fryer
BBC Essex sport

documents.title: man due in court following maldon pub stabbing
text: a 26-year-old man from maldon is due at chelmsford magistrates ' court today after another man was stabbed in the neck in a pub car park in the early hours of saturday morning .
the 37-year-old victim was attacked outside the warwick arms on the high street just after 02:00 , police said .
the attacker has been charged with wounding with intent .
author: Laura Safe
BBC Essex

documents.title: police called as diner dispute sees old vienna restaurant in leigh branded as 'like fawlty towers '
text: police were called to settle a furious dispute between restaurant customers and management , in a row that led to six members of staff walking out .
author: Southend Echo

documents.title: southend gets twitter talking
text: a list of the most talked about places on uk twitter in 2015 has put southend in the top three .
the seaside town came third in the most mentioned places on the social media site , with essex the second most popular .
it was our next-door neighbour london who came top of the list .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: meet the essex x factor finalists
text: two x factor contestants from essex have made it into the final .
che chesterman from laindon and louisa johnson from chafford hundred made it through along with reggie 'n ' bollie last night .
lauren murray is the latest contestant to go home from the competition .
author: Jenni Hulse
BBC Essex

documents.title: weather : turning drier and brighter today
text: after a grey start with a little light rain perhaps it should be a mostly dry day with increasing amounts of bright or sunny spells .
it will again be mild but breezy .
maximum temperature : 13c ( 55f ) .
author: Kate Kinsella
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: man arrested in loughton disturbance investigation
text: essex police says a 25-year-old man from enfield has been arrested on sus of causing grievous bodily harm following a disturbance in loughton .
the man was arrested last night in connection with the assault of a man in his 20s from walthamstow in the early hours of yesterday morning in high road .
the man has been released on police bail pending further inquiries .
author: Laura Safe
BBC Essex

documents.title: headlines : tilbury dock container death inquest essex teenagers reach x factor final
text: here are the top stories we 're looking at this morning :
author: Laura Safe
BBC Essex

documents.title: welcome to monday 's live page
text: good morning and welcome to essex live - hope you had a great weekend .
until 18:00 we 'll bring you all the latest news for our county .
if you 'd like to get in touch , you can email us , tweet us , or visit our facebook page .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live
